data.title: Aralaguppe village
data.text:
Chikmagalur >> Chikmagalur

Aralaguppe Village Details

Aralaguppe is a Village in Chikmagalur Taluka , Chikmagalur district and Karnataka State. Aralaguppe village Pin code is 577131. Aralaguppe Village Total population is 2538 and number of houses are 610. Female Population is 50.6%. Village literacy rate is 72.1% and the Female Literacy rate is 33.7%.

Population

Census Parameter Census Data Total Population 2538 Total No of Houses 610 Female Population % 50.6 % ( 1285) Total Literacy rate % 72.1 % ( 1831) Female Literacy rate 33.7 % ( 855) Scheduled Tribes Population % 2.3 % ( 59) Scheduled Caste Population % 67.3 % ( 1708) Working Population % 59.1 % Child(0 -6) Population by 2011 247 Girl Child(0 -6) Population % by 2011 48.2 % ( 119)

Location and Administration

Aralaguppe Village Gram Panchayath name is Allampura. Aralaguppe is 6 km distance from Sub District HeadQuarter Chikmagalur and it is 6 km distance from District HeadQuarter Chikmagalur. Nearest Statutory Town is Chikmagalur in 6 km Distance . Aralaguppe Total area is 798.79 hectares, Non-Agricultural area is 113.98 hectares andTotal irrigated area is 30 hectares

Education

Private Pre Primary, Govt Primary, Govt Middle and Govt Secondary Schools are available in this Village. Nearest Govt Senior Secondary School, Private Engineering College, Private MBA college, Govt Polytechnic College and Govt ITA College are in Chikmagalur. Nearest Govt Disabled School and Govt Arts and Science Degree College are in Chikmaglur. Nearest Govt Medical College is in Hassan.

Health

1 Primary Health care centre , 1 Primary Health Sub-Centre , 1 Maternity And Child Welfare centre , 1 TB Clinic , 1 Veterinary Hospital , 1 Family Welfare centre are available in this village.

Agriculture

Coffee and Paddy are agriculture commodities grow in this village. Total irrigated area in this village is 30 hectares from Lakes or tanks 5 hectares and from Rain water 25 hectares are the Sources of irrigation.

Drinking-Water and Sanitation

Treated Tap Water Supply all round the year and in summer also available. UnCovered Well, Hand Pump and Tube Wells/Boreholes are other Drinking Water sources.

Open Drainage System Available in this Village. There is no system to Collect garbage on street. Drain water is discharged directly into water bodies.

Communication

LandLine available. Mobile Coverage is available. Internet Centre available in this village. Nearest Private Courier Facility is in 5 - 10 km.

Transportation

Public Bus service available in this village. Private Bus service available in this village. There is no Railway Station in less than 10 km. Autos Available in this Village. Tractors Available in this Village. Animal Driven Carts are there in this Village.

No Nearest National Highway in less than 10 km. State Highway passes through this village. District Road passes through this village.

Pucca road, Kuccha Road, Macadam Road and Foot Path are other Roads and Transportation within the village.

Commerce

Nearest ATM is in 5 - 10 km. Nearest Commercial Bank is in 5 - 10 km. Nearest Cooperative Bank is in 5 - 10 km. Mandis/Regular Market and Weekly Haat/santha are available in this village.

Other Amenities

Anganwadi centre, ASHA, Birth &amp Death registration office, Sports facilities, Public library, Daily News Paper and Polling station are the other amenities in the village.
